messages.content: You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find customers who have placed orders
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM Orders);
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find customers who have placed orders
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName FROM Customers WHERE CustomerID IN (SELECT CustomerID FROM Orders);
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find all orders shipped to Brazil
SELECT OrderID, CustomerID, ShipCountry FROM Orders WHERE ShipCountry = 'Brazil';
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find all orders placed between January and March 1998
SELECT OrderID, OrderDate FROM Orders WHERE OrderDate BETWEEN '1998-01-01' AND '1998-03-31';
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
List all orders with no shipped date
SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
List the top 5 most expensive products
SELECT ProductName, UnitPrice FROM Products ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 5;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find products that have been ordered at least once
SELECT ProductID, ProductName FROM Products WHERE EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM [Order Details] WHERE [Order Details].ProductID = Products.ProductID);
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Which countries have more than 5 customers?
SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS CustomerCount FROM Customers GROUP BY Country HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Which countries have more than 5 customers?
SELECT Country, COUNT(*) AS CustomerCount FROM Customers GROUP BY Country HAVING COUNT(*) > 5;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
List product names, quantities, and customer names for all orders

SELECT Products.ProductName, [Order Details].Quantity, Customers.CompanyName FROM [Order Details] JOIN Products ON [Order Details].ProductID = Products.ProductID JOIN Orders ON [Order Details].OrderID = Orders.OrderID JOIN Customers ON Orders.CustomerID = Customers.CustomerID;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Find all customers whose name starts with A
SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName FROM Customers WHERE CompanyName LIKE 'A%';
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.

SELECT OrderID FROM Orders WHERE ShippedDate IS NULL;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.
Get all orders placed in 1997
SELECT OrderID, OrderDate FROM Orders WHERE strftime('%Y', OrderDate) = '1997';

SELECT ProductName, UnitPrice FROM Products ORDER BY UnitPrice DESC LIMIT 5;
You are a helpful assistant that converts natural language questions into SQL queries using the Northwind database.

SELECT CustomerID, CompanyName, Country FROM Customers WHERE Country = 'Germany';

Show each customer's name and total number of orders
SELECT Customers.CompanyName, COUNT(Orders.OrderID) AS TotalOrders FROM Customers JOIN Orders ON Customers.CustomerID = Orders.CustomerID GROUP BY Customers.CustomerID;
